title: 820-2936-B - USB Port Doesn't work
message:
Hi, i need your help, guys!
Here is the thing: I get light in the mouse (both port). However, the USB port doesn't work.
Do you guys have any advice/hint ?

title: 820-2936-B - USB Port Doesn't work
message: Any history liquid etc? Very common for both L4600 and L4610 to fail, so I'd say replace both of those and go from there.

title: 820-2936-B - USB Port Doesn't work
message:
None of USB ports works?
Then could be PCH issue.
Check resistance to ground and compare values on data lines.

Apart of L4600/10 there is U4650 (one port only), which can be removed; need to mount R4651/52 then.

title: 820-2936-B - USB Port Doesn't work
message: Replace L4600/10. Also please don't use comments as we don't see them.
